statements: DELETE FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization WHERE Layout_Type = 'Bulk Storage';
DELETE FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization WHERE Warehouse_ID = 1 AND Layout_Type = 'Bulk';
DELETE FROM Warehouse_Capacity_Utilization WHERE Current_Inventory < 1000 OR Max_Capacity > 5000;
DELETE FROM StorageLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 2 AND items_count > 50;
DELETE FROM storage_space WHERE warehouse_id = 1 AND capacity_utilization < 0.5;
DELETE FROM layout_optimization WHERE layout_type = 'optimal' AND space_id = 5;
DELETE FROM shelf_details WHERE shelf_id IN (SELECT shelf_id FROM item_inventory WHERE item_quantity = 0);
